name: .HDUMX File Extension
summary: Learn about .HDUMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by HotDocs, a digital form preparation program often used for designing legal and insurance forms; saves variable mapping information that enables third-party applications to interface with HotDocs.

content: HDUMX files are also referred to as "User Answer Source Mapping" files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
